SEARCH
Package RequestSystem

Class RequestService

Object
RequestService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Format, Load, Save, toObject, Write
public class RequestService extends Object implements Load, Format, Save, Write, toObject
The RequestService class implements methods for handling the persistence and retrieval of Request objects. It provides functionalities for loading, saving, formatting, and converting request records between objects and text representation. This class implements the Load, Format, Save, Write, and toObject interfaces.

    • load

      public List<?> load() throws IOException
      Loads request records from the specified file and converts them into a list of Request objects.
      Specified by:
      load in interface Load
      Returns:
      a list of Request objects loaded from the file.
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error reading the file or converting data.

    • save

      public void save(List<?> list) throws IOException
      Saves a list of Request objects to the specified file in text format.
      Specified by:
      save in interface Save
      Parameters:
      list - the list of Request objects to save.
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error writing to the file or if the list contains invalid objects.

      Converts a Request object into a formatted string representation for storage.

    • toObject

      public Object toObject(String string) throws IOException
      Converts a formatted string from the file into a Request object.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      a Request object created from the string.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the string format is invalid or cannot be parsed.
